mapper.select: select id, name, subTitle, originalPrice, promotePrice, stock, cid, createDate from product order by id asc
select id, name, subTitle, originalPrice, promotePrice, stock from product where cid = #{cid} order by id asc
select count(*) from product where cid = #{cid}
mapper.insert: insert into product ( name, subTitle, originalPrice, promotePrice, stock, cid, createDate) values ( #{name}, #{subTitle}, #{originalPrice}, #{promotePrice}, #{stock}, #{cid}, #{createDate} )
mapper.select: select p.id, p.name, p.subTitle, p.originalPrice, p.promotePrice, p.stock, p.cid, p.createDate, c.id as cate_id, c.name as cate_name from product p left join category c on p.cid = c.id where p.id = #{pid}
select p.id, p.promotePrice, p.name from product as p where name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
